inference parameters.from sentence: All inference parameters are tuned on a 200 example subset of the validation set .

copy mask.from sentence: Length penalty parameter ? and copy mask differ across models , with ? ranging from 0.6 to 1.4 , and ranging from 0.1 to 0.2 .

copy attention normalization parameter.from sentence: The coverage penalty parameter ? is set to 10 , and the copy attention normalization parameter ? to 2 for both approaches .

minimum length of.from sentence: The minimum length of the generated summary is set to 35 for CNN - DM and 6 for NYT .

use.from sentence: We use AllenNLP for the content selector , and Open NMT - py for the abstractive models .
